b is in the column spa<:e. it must obey the same law: 
Kirchhoff's Voltap LsII': hI + b) - h2 = o. 
By testing each loop, we decide whether b is in the column space. A x = b can be 
solved exactly when the components of b satisfy all the same dependencies as the rows 
of A. Then elimination leads to 0 = O. and Ax = b is consistent.
